import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Context } from '../../contexts'; import Login from './login'; export default function SignUpForm({ history }) { const { stateSignIn, dispatchSignIn, signInFunction } = useContext(Context); const { email, name, password, hasAgreed, errors, isLoading } = stateSignIn; const { handleInput, handleSubmit, handleReset } = signInFunction; return (
handleSubmit(e, stateSignIn, dispatchSignIn, history, 'sign-up') } >
handleInput(e, dispatchSignIn)} />
{errors.name}
handleInput(e, dispatchSignIn)} />
{errors.password}
handleInput(e, dispatchSignIn)} />
{errors.email}
I'm already member
); }
